verses.roman:
āji tumi niṣkapaṭe hailā kṛṣṇāśraya
kṛṣṇa āji niṣkapaṭe tomā haila sadaya

synonyms: āji—today; tumi—you; niṣkapaṭe—without a doubt; hailā—have become; kṛṣṇa-āśraya—under the shelter of Lord Kṛṣṇa; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; āji—today; niṣkapaṭe—without reservation; tomā—unto you; haila—has become; sa-daya—very merciful.
translation: "Indeed, today you have undoubtedly taken shelter of the lotus feet of Kṛṣṇa, and Kṛṣṇa, without reservation, has become very merciful toward you.
